TopicTitle: Is it possible with module manager to increase every parts mass?

Articles.Content:
Sorry I'm pretty new to module manager. I know there are scripts such as  

@PART[*]:HAS[@RESOURCE[MonoPropellant]]
{
    @RESOURCE[MonoPropellant]
    {
        @amount *= 1.3
        @maxAmount *= 1.3
    }
}

which multiplies every parts monoprop by 1.3 but is it possible to do the same with mass?

Sure

That would look like this: 

@PART[*]
{
	@mass *= 1.3
}
